qabala.gloss: an esoteric or occult matter resembling the Kabbalah that is traditionally secret

qabalah.gloss: an esoteric or occult matter resembling the Kabbalah that is traditionally secret

qabbala.gloss: an esoteric theosophy of rabbinical origin based on the Hebrew scriptures and developed between the 7th and 18th centuries

qabbalah.gloss: an esoteric theosophy of rabbinical origin based on the Hebrew scriptures and developed between the 7th and 18th centuries

qaddafi.gloss: Libyan leader who seized power in a military coup d'etat in 1969

qadhafi.gloss: Libyan leader who seized power in a military coup d'etat in 1969

qaeda.gloss: a terrorist network intensely opposed to the United States that dispenses money and logistical support and training to a wide variety of radical Islamic terrorist groups

qara qum.gloss: a desert in Turkmenistan to the south of the Aral Sea

qassam brigades.gloss: the military arm of Hamas responsible for suicide bombings and other attacks on Israel

qat.gloss: the leaves of the shrub Catha edulis which are chewed like tobacco or used to make tea

qatar.gloss: an Arab country on the peninsula of Qatar
a peninsula extending northward from the Arabian mainland into the Persian Gulf

qatar peninsula.gloss: a peninsula extending northward from the Arabian mainland into the Persian Gulf

qatari.gloss: a native or inhabitant of Qatar
of or concerning Qatar or its inhabitants

qatari riyal.gloss: the basic unit of money in Qatar

qabalistic.gloss: having a secret or hidden meaning
